tweets.text: America is teachers demanding livable wages, students calling for an end to gun violence, activists calling for justice, and people everywhere making their voices heard. It's time all of us listen.

Thank you @GovernorTomWolf for your efforts to bring common sense gun safety to Pennsylvania.  Had these measures been in place on February 13th, the Parkland school shooting would not have happened and my daughter would still be alive today.   https://t.co/nLMWRNFWZY

I’m tired of people saying, “The only way to stop a bad guy with a gun is a good guy with a gun.“ 

Fighting fire with fire never got anything done. It just burned everything down.  

It is the same reason why we must never fight hate with hate. Only love can drive out hate.
One of my favourite movie Easter eggs still has to be Ripley's harpoon gun stuck in the door at the beginning of Aliens, look out for it next time you watch. https://t.co/CfDWMk9GEE

Good morning...

While my friends and I focus on the gun violence epidemic that is causing the deaths of countless Americans from schools to waffle houses, try to do one act of kindness today.

If a clear opportunity for an act of kindness doesn’t come to you, call a relative.

In March, the @NRA posted its best fundraising month in 15 years. 

The NRA is NOT a civil rights organization; it’s a fundraiser for gun manufacturers trying to protect their interests.

I don't have an issue with people whose views oppose my own. I have an issue with people who are disrespectful articulating those views. I am open to any and all forms of preventing gun violence, but there doesn't need to be disrespect and hatred coming with those ideas

We are launching our biggest effort yet to ensure that the young people who are leading the charge against gun violence will have a voice in the 2018 elections and beyond.

Learn how we're teaming up with @Everytown & @NextGenAmerica: https://t.co/M5eK5AYWKa

Mike Pence is scheduled to speak at the NRA convention in Dallas on May 4. This is a slap in the face to Americans—from Parkland to Chicago to Nashville—hurting from gun violence. 

SIGN THIS PETITION to demand Mike Pence pull out of the NRA convention.

As most know, my daughter was killed in the Parkland school shooting. Please sign the petition and ask VP Pence to become part of the solution for gun safety.
